de.engehausen.treemap

Interface IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T extends java.lang.Number>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node returned by model.
    T - the weight type.
    All Superinterfaces:
    ITreeModel<N>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    GenericTreeModelEx, ScientificModel

    public interface IGenericWeightedTreeModel<N,T extends java.lang.Number>
extends ITreeModel<N>
    An extension to the weighted tree model which supports arbitrary number-based weight types. This may be used where precision is needed that long cannot provide, e.g. by using BigDecimal. Warning: For huge models, using objects instead of the long primitive data type can be detrimental to performance.

    • Method Detail

      • getWeight

        T getWeight(N node)
        The precise weight of the node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node for which to return the weight.
        Returns:
        the weight of the node, or a value representing zero if the node is not known. Never returns null.

      • getArithmetic

        NumberArithmetic<T> getArithmetic()
        Returns the number arithmetic instance for the model.
        Returns:
        the number arithmetic instance for the model, never null.
